meanings.sent1: The artist used magenta to paint the flowers.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was a beautiful shade of magenta.
meanings.sent3: The magenta sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.
meanings.sent4: The magenta of her cheeks showed her embarrassment.
meanings.sent5: The magenta of the rose was striking against the green leaves.

meanings.definition: A dye or pigment of this color.
meanings.sent1: The magenta dye gave the fabric a rich color.
meanings.sent2: The painter mixed red and blue to create magenta.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally spilled magenta dye on her white shirt.
meanings.sent4: The magenta pigment was used to color the walls of the house.
meanings.sent5: The magenta paint brightened up the room instantly.
